data.title: Roman numerals
data.statement:
A group of interdimensional travelers came to our dimension but they only use Roman numerals. Can you help them create a converter to Arabic numerals?

These rules will help you:
I = 1
V = 5
X = 10
L = 50
C = 100
D = 500
M = 1000
IV = 4, IX = 9, XL = 40, XC = 90, CD = 400, CM = 900
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A string [[S]] which contains a roman number.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for a decimal number.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A group of interdimensional travelers came to our dimension but they only use Roman numerals. Can you help them create a converter to Arabic numerals?

These rules will help you:
I = 1
V = 5
X = 10
L = 50
C = 100
D = 500
M = 1000
IV = 4, IX = 9, XL = 40, XC = 90, CD = 400, CM = 900
Input
Line 1: A string S which contains a roman number.
Output
Line 1: An integer N for a decimal number.
Constraints
Example
Input
VI
Output
6
